sentences.sContent: Luna turned her protuberant eyes upon him in surprise.
sentences.sContent_eng: Luna turned her protuberant eyes upon him in surprise.
sentences.sCn: 卢娜那双向外突出的眼睛惊讶地转向了他。

synos.tran: 突起的；招人注意的；显著的

remMethod.val: pro(向前) ＋ tuber(块茎) ＋ ant → 像块茎一样突出的 → 突出的

words.tran: 突出的；伸出的；招人注意的

trans.tranOther: Protuberant eyes, lips, noses, or teeth stick out more than usual from the face
